title: Land with Waterfront & Mountain View for Sale
details:
Land with Waterfront & Mountain View for Sale


LAND FOR SALE - GONAWALA, DIGANA. (Kundasale DS Division) KANDY DISTRICT.

Perches 760 , ( 4 , 3/4 Acres ) and more 9 Acres for sale. Price - Rs 55,000 per perch.

1. Clear Deed and Surveyor plan.

2. Less than one & half kilo meter - Government concrete road to land, from Kandy Mahiyangana main road with accessibility every light and heavy vehicles.

3. Pipe borne water supply and three phase electricity at land boundary road.

4. Flat and gently sloping land .


Panoramic Mountain view & The View of Victoria Reservoir.

* Suitable for Residence. - Echo friendly Cabana Restaurants & Cottages etc;

* 05 minutes distance to Digana Location

* 05 minutes to famous Pallekele International Cricket stadium

* Victoria Golf Club 8 km.

* Popular international Schools, Banks , Hospitals & Super Markets at door step

* 12 km from kandy Town.
